channel.title: Forked River Amateur Radio Club
channel.description: Recent content on Forked River Amateur Radio Club

item.title: First Club Meeting - June 23rd, 2018
item.description: The Forked River Amateur Radio Club will hold its first meeting on the morning of Saturday, June 23rd at 11:00 AM. Please bring your own radio equipment and folding chairs. We will discuss some of our goals for the club and how membmers will be able to participate going forward. The first meeting will largely be informal and a chance for members to get an idea of our vision for the club and what we hope to accomplish.
